channel.title: Amazon on Kube for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Amazon on Kube for Hugo

item.title: Using Amazon Sqs With Powershell
item.description: Amazon SQS is a flexible queue service that has many uses cases, from scalable web applications and processing systems to inter-application communications. This is useful if you need to process lots of data at once or have threads or workers to do a specific action to a large pool of data. With the explosion of use cases for PowerShell and Docker in production systems, you can easily scale using queue systems like Amazon SQS.
